name: Legend of the Wizard's Quest
description:
The land of Barley is under threat! An evil sorcerer will stop at nothing to rule all the world. The last wizard is the only one who can defeat stand in their way.

Explore the fantasy world of Barley, defeat evil monsters, find powerful magic, and thwart the Sorcerer's evil plans in this retro styled action-adventure!

  • Retro Visuals: Blast from the past, visually inspired by classic action-adventure games.
  • Many Spells to Discover: Powerful magics like the fire bolt await.
  • A Big Open World: Explore unique areas like the great forest or rocky Westbrook.
  • No Hand Holding: Just like the good old days!
